title: Distributed Development Stack (DDS) Field Guide
positioning: The definitive source for mainstream technology practitioners to discover and understand the tools and concepts prominent in the shift to the distributed development stack (DDS).

themes.description: The cloud is the default platform.
CI servers deploy code, not ops.
The application runs locally on development.
The environment is automated in the code.
Tests done in code, not by a QA department.
Containers are the default deployment target.
